commentaire: Orange bank was about to close, Hello Bank was then suggested as an alternative.My partner has a residence in France but does not speak English. The advisor I had on the phone said communication would be a problem, thus it would be better for him to open an account in one of their offices. Sounds to me more like passing along a "problem" he doesn't want to deal with. When told we were opening an account upon the recommendation of Orange Bank, he broke the number 1 rule of sales personnel. He said and get this, you are not obliged to open an account with us, it was only a recommendation. Bad vibes started from the message he left on my mobile. I played it 4 times to try to catch the name of the company. Never mentioned. This holds truth, one who can't handle small tasks, cannot achieve excellence anywhere.
reponses: Hello S.R,We are sorry to read about this situation. We are indeed a french bank and even if some of our advisors can speak a little english, we do not provide a full english service. The advisor suggested your partner to open an account with BNP Paribas which is our main company and which provide international services and english speaking advisors.Here's the link to follow : https://mabanque.bnpparibas/en/homeWe wish you the best and a nice day.Michael

commentaire: I have been with Britline over three years since I came to France. I am 62 and I can honestly say that I have never experienced such amazing customer service, every single time I have had to call. And being 62 I have called for the most trivial of reasons‚Ä¶lol. Just for being talked through how to use the online banking etc.  I can quickly speak to someone without pressing buttons and every single Britline advisor that I have spoken to has been amazing. I used to be with Barclays Premier Banking in the Uk‚Ä¶And pay a fee for the privilege. If I wanted to speak to someone, I had to tap dance pressing numbers for 5 minutes to get through‚Ä¶and then speak to someone in a large call centre who seemed to just want the call over ASAP‚Ä¶presumably under pressure to take the next.Britline on the other hand , takes me back 40 years when people were actually interested in you and sincere in solving your problems.  If you are from the UK and are looking for a bank, you would be crazy not to choose Britline.Thank you Britline for your Amazon customer service.John
commentaire_text: i have been with britline over three years since i came to france. i am 62 and i can honestly say that i have never experienced such amazing customer service, every single time i have had to call. and being 62 i have called for the most trivial of reasons lol. just for being talked through how to use the online banking etc. i can quickly speak to someone without pressing buttons and every single britline advisor that i have spoken to has been amazing. i used to be with barclays premier banking in the uk and pay a fee for the privilege. if i wanted to speak to someone, i had to tap dance pressing numbers for 5 minutes to get through and then speak to someone in a large call centre who seemed to just want the call over asap presumably under pressure to take the next.britline on the other hand , takes me back 40 years when people were actually interested in you and sincere in solving your problems. if you are from the uk and are looking for a bank, you would be crazy not to choose britline.thank you britline for your amazon customer service.john

commentaire: Younited is a good platform that offers a fast and reliable initial service, and I cannot deny this.However, I have rated it two (2) stars due to issues I encountered after making an early payment with the "reduce installment amount" option. Despite discussing this with customer service, the following month I was supposed to see my installment reduced by approximately ‚Ç¨30, but it was not reduced, and I still received the full amount.I await clarification as soon as possible, especially since Younited is aware that I have paid several installments to close the account earlier, and these were higher payments to finish sooner.I urgently await clarification and resolution of this issue.Sincerely,
reponses: Good morning,We thank you for taking the time to leave us a comment.We are delighted to have you among our customers, however, we are sorry to read that you are not fully satisfied with your Younited experience.We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we will do everything we can to ensure that your experience at Younited is optimal.Do not hesitate to send us any other comments as customer satisfaction is at the heart of our concerns.Have a great day,
commentaire_text: younited is a good platform that offers a fast and reliable initial service, and i cannot deny this.however, i have rated it two 2 stars due to issues i encountered after making an early payment with the reduce installment amount option. despite discussing this with customer service, the following month i was supposed to see my installment reduced by approximately 30, but it was not reduced, and i still received the full amount.i await clarification as soon as possible, especially since younited is aware that i have paid several installments to close the account earlier, and these were higher payments to finish sooner.i urgently await clarification and resolution of this issue.sincerely,

commentaire: Worst bank Ever.I just opened a bank account with them. needed to transfert money. Here where it get funny, I transfert money from the aps. Wait 2 days, no update. I then receive an email asking me to justify.Okay fair enough ... I reply ... Two days, still no answer .. I decide to call customer service. They ask me the exact same question and tell me that it will be validated within 48 hours .. 48 hours later, I receive a call where the person asking me what I intend to do with the money (wait for real).I reply that christmas is coming, im thinking of buying a car or a camera (we're talking abt 3K‚Ç¨).She said ok, this will be solved. Next day I receive an email asking me the exact same thing but ask me to join an invoice as a proof that im gonna buy a car (for real?).We're talking about same owner, two different banks, moving money from fortuneo to a different bank.So as crazy this may sound, I comply, send them proof. Then I call them, While I am writing this review, i am on the phone from the past 37minutes and I already explain the situation to 4 differents person and STILL not solved ... This is the worst experience EVER ...
